casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Michael SHERIDAN No. 82P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Michael Sheridan, for Sheridan, Michael. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 10th of March 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Wake County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
